=Known Issues=

===Encoding profile names must be all lowercase to work in auto mode===<br>
If you make your own encoding profiles (name.enc files under encode folder) be sure to use all lowercase file names otherwise they won't work when used in auto transfers mode.

===VRD QS fix===<br>
Currently VideoRedo Quickstream Fix doesn't work when run as a windows service, so if using kmttg in windows service mode you need to avoid enabling VRD QS fix step.
